languages.text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Это существо ограждено щитом и получает +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Щит можно уничтожить, если снизить {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} существа до 0. В таком случае щит взрывается и убивает владельца, а Сфера ограждения получит 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Если временное здоровье владельца больше нуля, в следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} щит исчезнет и создаст ядовитое облако, которое наносит урон противникам и исцеляет союзников владельца щита до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 damage to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

languages.text: Это существо ограждено щитом и получает +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Щит можно уничтожить, если снизить {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} существа до 0. В таком случае щит взрывается и убивает владельца, а Сфера ограждения получит 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Если временное здоровье владельца больше нуля, в следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} щит исчезнет и создаст ядовитое облако, которое наносит урон противникам и исцеляет союзников владельца щита до конца боя.
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

languages.text: このシールドはホストに+3の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を授け、生物の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が0になると取り除かれる。この場合、シールドは吹き飛ばされ、ホストが死んでしまい、オクルーディング・スフィアに10{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。ホストの{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が0を超えた場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で消え去り、毒雲を発生させ、戦闘終了までホストの敵にダメージを与え味方を回復させる。
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: このシールドはホストに3の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を与え、生物の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}傷{/g}が0になると取り除かれる。この場合、シールドは吹き飛ばされてホストが死に、オクルーディング・スフィアに10ダメージを与える。ホストの{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が0を超えた場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で消え去り、毒雲を発生させ、戦闘終了時までホストの敵にダメージを与え味方を回復させる。

languages.text: 此护盾使宿主获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，当该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}降为0时失效。护盾失效时会爆炸，杀死宿主，并对遮蔽力场造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果宿主的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}大于0，在下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时临时生命值会消失，产生剧毒云雾，对宿主的敌人造成伤害，并治疗宿主的盟友，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 此护盾使宿主获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，当该生物的临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}降为0时失效。护盾失效时会爆炸，杀死宿主，并对遮蔽力场造成10点伤害。如果宿主的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}大于0，在下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时临时生命值会消失，产生剧毒云雾，对宿主的敌人造成伤害，并治疗宿主的盟友，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: El escudo proporciona a su anfitrión +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y desaparece si las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} de la criatura bajan a 0. En ese caso, el escudo explota, mata al anfitrión e inflige 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a la esfera de Oclusión. Si las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} del anfitrión son superiores a 0, en el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} desaparecerá y creará una nube venenosa que inflige daño a los enemigos del anfitrión y cura a sus aliados hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El escudo proporciona a su anfitrión +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y desaparece si las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} de la criatura bajan a 0. En ese caso, el escudo explota, mata al anfitrión e inflige 10 de daño a la esfera de Oclusión. Si las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} del anfitrión son superiores a 0, en el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} desaparecerá y creará una nube venenosa que inflige daño a los enemigos del anfitrión y cura a sus aliados hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Dieser Schild gewährt dem Wirt +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und wird entfernt, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} der Kreatur auf 0 fallen. In diesem Fall explodiert der Schild und tötet den Wirt, wodurch die Unterdrückungssphäre 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} des Wirts über 0 liegen, verschwindet er in der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und hinterlässt bis zum Ende des Kampfes eine Giftwolke, die bei den Feinden des Wirts Schaden verursacht und seine Verbündeten heilt.
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Schild gewährt dem Wirt +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und wird entfernt, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} der Kreatur auf 0 fallen. In diesem Fall explodiert der Schild und tötet den Wirt, was 10 Schaden bei der Unterdrückungssphäre verursacht. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} des Wirts über 0 liegen, wird er in der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verschwinden und bis zum Ende des Kampfes eine Giftwolke hinterlassen, die bei den Feinden des Wirts Schaden verursacht und seine Verbündeten heilt.

languages.text: Ce bouclier confère à son hôte +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et disparaît si les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} de la créature atteignent 0. Dans ce cas, le bouclier explose et élimine l'hôte, infligeant 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à la sphère d'inhibition. Si les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} de l'hôte sont supérieures à 0, le bouclier disparaît au {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant en créant un nuage toxique qui inflige des dégâts aux ennemis de l'hôte et soigne ses alliés jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Ce bouclier confère à son hôte +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et disparaît si les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} de la créature atteignent 0. Dans ce cas, le bouclier explose et élimine l'hôte, infligeant 10 points de dégâts à la Sphère d'Inhibition. Si les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} de l'hôte sont supérieures à 0, le bouclier disparaît au {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant en créant un nuage toxique qui inflige des dégâts aux ennemis de l'hôte et soigne ses alliés jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Bu kalkan, konakçısına +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır ve yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı 0'a indiğinde de ortadan kalkar. Bu durumda kalkan patlayarak konakçıyı öldürür, Önleyici Küre'ye 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Konakçının {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı 0'dan büyükse bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} kalkan yok olur ve konakçının düşmanlarına hasar veren, dost birimlerini ise iyileştiren zehirli bir bulut oluşturur. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: This shield grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} reach 0. In this case, the shield blows up and kills the host, dealing 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Occluding Sphere. If the host's {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are above 0, on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} it will fade away and create a poisonous cloud that deals damage to the host's enemies and heals the host's allies until the end of combat.
